title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2006.1 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 2006.1 - Definitions

State Regulations
(a) Award means
general awards, academic performance awards and fellowships as these terms are
defined in section
2200.2
of this Title. (b) Institution means college or vocational
institution as these terms are defined in section
2001.1
of this Title. (c) Limitation means the continuance of an
institution's eligibility, subject to compliance with special conditions or
restrictions which have been set by the corporation as a result of an
institution's failure to comply with applicable law, regulation or
agreements. (d) Suspension means
the cessation of an institution's participation in awards programs for a
specific period of time. (e) Termination means the cessation of an institution's participation in awards
programs. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
2006.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
